Name: 十月怪谈-Insane Rules
About the game: When you wake up and find yourself at home alone, you suddenly receive a phone message from your mother who is worshipping the ancestors in her hometown. You need to abide by dozens of long and strange rules to spend seven days at home alone. During this period, you will face many strange and strange events alone. Don't look in the mirror, close the toilet, and don't pull the curtain... You need to keep your life healthy and safe, and you must also keep your head in front of a series of SAN events to survive until your mother returns. Game features: Simple line draft style, exquisite dubbing throughout, full of atmosphere. The weird story design is very scary and stimulating. The unique rules of the home scene will bring you a unique experience! If you like survival reasoning horror games, you must not miss it~ Introduction: You need to spend seven days alone at home according to a long and strange set of [rules]. During this period, you should ensure that your vital signs and intelligence are normal. You can choose to abide by [rules] or try to break [rules]. In these seven days, you will face panic and anxiety alone, which will be a test of survival. Obey the rules, or venture boldly? Different choices will bring you a different fate and outcome.
